name: Crazy Crime Simulator the Action Game
name_original: Crazy Crime Simulator the Action Game
description:
Crazy Crime Simulator the Action Game

Its about survival and smashing in car. All happening is high quality 3D. You can also play missions where you must hunt around for various objects, lights, signs. etc. Chase down the people, cars.
The ultimate goal is to do as much damage as possible to maximize your score.

Some go ahead and give this funny Simulator Game a try.
Complete the tasks and destroy the city in this action packed grand city destroyer game.

All New and Exciting Missions! Go And Take Whatever You Want as the Crime Lord!

Play as a real monster player - run, destroy, demolish and make the biggest rampage this world has ever seen.

There are 3 characters available in this game raptor, Monster and police. they are fight with player.

To know more about this game just play and download this game.
It is free to play game and download.....

Top Game Features Include:-

=> 4 Massive Maps to explore
=> Desert maps, City and Farm Settings
=> Excellent sound effects
=> High Quality 3D graphics and exciting gameplay.
